description:
The story of Medaka continues but the writers are saving that for another time.  Enjoy this bonus story of everyone’s favorite loser.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bangai Hen: Good Loser Kumagawa - Dai Minus Juunisou: Seitokai o Shikei Shikkou Suru
番外編 グッドルーザー球磨川 第マイナス十二槽「生徒会を死刑執行する」
